Finding files on your computer can be frustrating, especially when you have a lot of them. Fortunately, UltraFileSearch Lite is a file search software that makes it easy to find your files quickly and efficiently. This powerful tool is designed to help users locate and manage their files with ease, and it has several features that set it apart from other search tools.

## Features

Here are some of the outstanding features of UltraFileSearch Lite:

- Search by name, date created, date modified, or file size.
- Narrow down your search by excluding certain file types.
- Search within subfolders or exclude subfolders from your search.
- Preview files before opening them.
- Save your search settings for future use.

## User-Friendly Interface

One of the best things about UltraFileSearch Lite is its user-friendly interface. The software is easy to navigate, and all of the search options are clearly labeled. You can customize your search settings to suit your needs, and the software will remember your preferences in future searches.

## Quick and Efficient

UltraFileSearch Lite is one of the fastest file search tools available. It is incredibly efficient at scanning your hard drive and finding your files. With this software, you can search through thousands of files in just a few seconds. 

## Conclusion

Overall, UltraFileSearch Lite is an exceptional file search tool that is perfect for anyone who needs to find files quickly and efficiently. Its user-friendly interface, versatile search options, and lightning-fast speed make it an ideal choice for both personal and professional use. With UltraFileSearch Lite, you'll never have to waste time searching for files on your computer again.
